author: Doha Madani
title: Idaho issues stay-at-home order
description: Idaho Gov. Brad Little announced a stay-at-home order for the state on Wednesday and signed an extreme emergency declaration.
content:
Gov. Brad Little announced a stay-at-home order for Idaho on Wednesday and signed an extreme emergency declaration.
The order says residents must self-isolate, close non-essential businesses and it will last at least 21 days as the country combats the corona… [+7672 chars]
